## Summary

## Testing

- [ ] `npm test`
- [ ] `npm run lint`
- [ ] `npm run build`

## Checklist

- [ ] Linked issue (e.g. `Fixes #123`) if applicable
- [ ] Docs updated if behavior changed
- [ ] No unrelated refactors
- [ ] Signed-off-by present in all commits (`git commit -s`)

---

**DCO check failing?** Run `git commit --amend --signoff` then `git push --force-with-lease`
